About Me

I am studying informatics at the Ionian University. I am aspiring to learn as much as possible about what Computations are, the Processing of Information, and to become an expert Programmer. All in all i strive so that at the time this experience is over, i will know deeply about about computing, information and every part that makes a computer what it is.
